title: Dr.ミームン presents　防衛兵器"ミーム殺害エージェント"
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Zen+Maru+Gothic:wght@500;700;900&display=swap');
.pop{
font-family: 'Zen Maru Gothic', sans-serif;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.omolike {
  margin: 20px 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  line-height: 1.6em;
}

.omokao {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  display: inline-grid;
  height: 92px;
  width: 85px;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  line-height: 13px;
  font-size: 11px;
  text-align: center;
  
  grid-template-columns: 2px 81px 2px;
  grid-template-rows: 3px 73px 8px 8px;
}

.omokao img {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 77px;
  width: 77px;
  grid-column-start: 2;
  grid-row-start: 2;
  
  border: solid black 2px;
  border-radius: 40px;
}

.omokao .omonam {
  align-self: flex-end;
  grid-column-start: 2;
  grid-row: 3;
  text-shadow: white 1px 1px, white -1px 1px, white 1px -1px, white -1px -1px;
  z-index: 1;
}

[[/module]]
[[include :scp-jp:theme:yamisushi]]
[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Outfit:wght@500&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+JP:wght@500&display=swap');
body {
    font-family: 'Outfit', 'Noto Sans JP', sans-serif;
    font-weight: bold;
}

[[/module]]

[[include :scp-jp:credit:start]]
**タイトル:** Dr.ミームン presents　防衛兵器"ミーム殺害エージェント"
**著者:** [[*user Syutaro]]
**作成年:** 2023
[[include :scp-jp:credit:end]]
　
[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]闇寿司職人って、よく機動部隊に襲撃されて死ぬじゃないですか。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]前提みたいに言ってるがそんな話は知らない。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]一対多で勝てる闇寿司職人って少ないので、手軽に使える防衛兵器が必要だと思うんです。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]……まあ、ラーメンでも一度に対応できるのは4人が限度だな。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]そこで本日提案するのは、"ミーム殺害エージェント"、略してミー殺です！
[[/div]]


> ++ 登場人物紹介
>
> [[div_ class="omolike"]]
> [[div_ class="omokao"]]
> [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
> [[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
> 闇
> [[/div]]
> [[/div]]闇寿司の長。今すぐにでもミームン博士を破門したいが、最近入門者が減っているので堪えている。
> [[/div]]
>
>
> [[div_ class="omolike"]]
> [[div_ class="omokao"]]
> [[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
> [[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
> ミームン博士
> [[/div]]
> [[/div]]元財団職員のミームマニア。博士号は持ってないし、ドクタートラヤ―には破門されている。
> [[/div]]
> 　
> ##414243|反ミームン博士　　[[size 115%]]ミームン博士の親友にしてライバル。反ミーム寿司を餌にドクタートラヤ―に捕らえられ、恐るべき反ミーム闇寿司職人に改造されてしまう。本人的にはちょっと嬉しいらしい。[[/size]]##　
> 　
　
[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ミー殺を簡単に説明すると、見たら死ぬ画像です。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]おいまさか今朝送ってきたLINEの画像って……
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]それは対抗ミームですね。ミーちゃん……失敬、ミー殺で死なないためのミームとお考えください。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]君今ミーちゃんと言ったか。見たら死ぬ画像のことを。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]つまり、対抗ミームさえあればミー殺で死ぬことはありません。自滅も同士討ちも防げます。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]なるほどな。でも、具体的にどうやってミー殺とやらを見せるんだ？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]よくぞ訊いてくださいました。スライドをご覧ください。
[[/div]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-31-6y1k/memesatsuinsatsu.jpg]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]君は本当に何をしているんだ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]プリントしたミー殺を襲撃者に見せるだけ！安価かつ簡単に撃退できます！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]まあ確かに安価かつ楽だ。ただ、プリンターを持ってない職人はどうするんだ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]コンビニで印刷できますよ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]店員が死にかねないからやめろ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]さて、この印刷したミー殺を見せる戦術ですが、大きな問題があります。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]まず寿司じゃないし回ってもいない。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]一番の問題は、襲撃者をミー殺に注目させなければならないという点です。ミー殺は意識の内に入らなければ一切の効力を有しません。そこで、注目させる手段として考えたのがこちら！
[[/div]]


[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-32-zuf4/%E5%85%B5%E5%99%A8%E6%A1%88%EF%BC%91%E3%83%9F%E3%83%BC%E6%AE%BA%E3%83%AB%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AC%E3%83%83%E3%83%88.png]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]いや、確かにちょっと注目するかもしれないが。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]そうでしょうそうでしょう。回るから寿司ですし。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]それは認めない。この「当たり」って何だ？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]そこだけに注目すれば死なないので当たりです。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ここだけに注目するには周囲の主張が強すぎる。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]しかし、こういったものは正直、対抗ミームを準備できる連中には使いにくいんですよね。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]よく考えろ、本当に問題はそこなのか？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]対抗ミームへの対策として、多種多様なミー殺を見せられるようにする必要があるのですが……
[[/div]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-33-r03c/%E3%83%9F%E3%83%BC%E6%AE%BA%E8%A9%B0%E3%82%81%E5%90%88%E3%82%8F%E3%81%9B2.png]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]左下は絶対ミー殺じゃないだろ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]つまり、一度に見せるミー殺は一個ずつ、切り替えを早くする方向性でなければいけないんですね。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]無視だけはやめてくれ。もう嫌な予感しかしないぞ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]そこで思い付いたのがこちら！
[[/div]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-34-21zs/%E5%85%B5%E5%99%A8%E6%A1%882%20%E3%83%9F%E3%83%BC%E6%AE%BA%E3%83%95%E3%83%AA%E3%83%83%E3%83%97%E8%8A%B8.png]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]右の奴は何？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]対抗ミーム持ちですね。すぐさま二枚目、三枚目と切り替えていけばこういった対抗ミーム持ちも殺せます。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]見た目のポップさに反してやり口が恐ろしすぎる。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]アレンジバージョンとしてこんなのも考えてみたのですが……
[[/div]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-35-slgi/%E3%83%9F%E3%83%BC%E6%AE%BA%E3%82%AF%E3%82%A4%E3%82%BA.png]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]誰だ。そしてなんで満場一致でミー殺なんだよ。こいつらには何が見えてるんだ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]引っかけ問題だと思ったんですかね？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]っていうか、フリップなんて持ってる闇寿司職人いないだろ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ご安心ください！
[[/div]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-36-6eqe/%E7%94%BB%E7%94%A8%E7%B4%99%E4%BB%A3%E7%94%A8.jpg]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]見えてる！　例のおっさんの顎がちょっと見えてる！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]このように、画用紙にミー殺を貼り付けるだけで代用できちゃいます！
[[/div]]


[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]……そろそろ寿司、出るんだろうな？　次の案が何か言わないと破門するぞ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]……パワーポイントでミー殺のスライドショー、っていうのを……
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]うん、それはもう飛ばせ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]そんな！　応用としてプロジェクションマッピングミー殺とかも考えたんですよ！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]どうして規模をデカくするんだそこで！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]屋外戦で役立つじゃないですか！　想像せよ、シンデレラ城に浮かぶミー殺の姿を！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]想像したら尚更却下だ。何人巻き添えが出るんだ。っていうかあんな所で戦うな。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]私はここで、これまでの防衛兵器に粗があったことを悟りました。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]随分遅かったな君は。寿司を出せ寿司を。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]それは、外出先で襲われた際に対応できないという点です。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]まさか、私の声が聴こえていないのか？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]外出先でサッと出せて、注目も浴びられるミー殺といえばやっぱり……
[[/div]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-37-yyip/%E5%85%B5%E5%99%A8%E6%A1%884%20%E3%83%9F%E3%83%BC%E6%AE%BA%E5%88%BA%E9%9D%92.png width="500px"]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ミー殺で時代劇ごっこするな。っていうか初見だろ死んでるんだから。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ミーちゃんとの一体化、素晴らしい……
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]エクスタシーを感じるな。本当に銭湯に入れないタトゥーだぞこれ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]実際、闇寿司なんて反社みたいなものじゃないですか。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]まあね。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ちなみに、両肌脱いでダブルでミーム刺青を見せたり。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]どうしてそんな酷いことを思い付くんだ君は。
[[/div]]

[[=image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A8284553-38-ebys/%E4%B8%A1%E8%82%8C%E5%88%BA%E9%9D%92.png width="500px"]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]なんで全員無事になってるんだ。おっさん対抗ミームだろこれ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]対抗ミームン博士……？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]いないだろそんな奴。自分の対になる存在を捏造するな。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]反ミームン博士ならいるんですけどね。ほら、親方の背後に。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]怖いからやめろ。そろそろ寿司を出しなさい。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]もう！　今寿司出そうと思ってたのに！　親方が言うからやる気無くなった！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]子供か。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]まあ一応、親方に黙ってもらうためにちらし寿司型のミー殺を考えたんですよ。卵とでんぶとネギでなんとかミー殺を作ったんです。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ほお、いいじゃないか。で、そのちらし寿司は？
[[/div]]
　
　
　
[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file:8284553-42-rbx6/%E5%9B%9E%E8%BB%A2%E3%81%A1%E3%82%89%E3%81%97%E5%AF%BF%E5%8F%B8.png]]
　
[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]回したら効果なくなるんですよね。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]嫌な予感はしてたよ。回すことで無力化される寿司なんて闇寿司初じゃないか。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]提案なんですが、寿司回すのやめません？
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]絶対ダメだろ……もしかして、スシブレ―ドとミー殺って相性悪いんじゃないのか。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]そんなことはありません！　回すっていう前提さえ無ければ！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]だから、我々の根幹を否定するな。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]新概念としていかがですか"スシ見せ"。ミーム画像自体、精神酢飯漬けみたいな洗脳にも使えますし。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ミー殺使ってるような所に入門したい奴とかいないだろ。最近入門者減ってるし、もっとポップ路線でいく方針なんだ。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ご安心ください、ポップな絵柄のミー殺も用意しております。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]却下だ。これ以上続けたら本気で破門する。絶対に破門する。
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]……結構。私の背中をご覧いただきましょう。
[[/div]]


[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]断る。多分おかしなミーム刺青入れてるだろ君。私は帰るぞ……あれ、身体が！　動かない！
[[/div]]


[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]よくやった、反ミームン博士！　しっかり押さえてろ！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]マジで背後にいたのかよ！　クソ！　放せ！　やめろ！　瞼をつまむんじゃない！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]いいぞ！　くらえ！
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-30-dh10/DarkSushiLogo.jpg style="border-color: #F899E1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #F899E1;"]]
闇
[[/div]]
[[/div]]やめろ！　これからはポップ路線でいくんだ！　やめ……
[[/div]]
　
　
　
　
　
　
[[=image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A8284553-40-3128/Tuna_Sushimeme.jpg]]

[[div_ class="omolike"]]
[[div_ class="omokao"]]
[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:8284553-23-1vqf/Doctor%20Tom%20Saves%20The%20Day%21mini.jpg style="border-color: #4169e1;"]]
[[div_ class="omonam" style="color: #4169e1;"]]
ミームン博士
[[/div]]
[[/div]]ミー殺、寿司ということでよろしいですね？
[[/div]]
